events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position at 9 AM today, including their resume and cover letter detailing relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords like software engineer and development experience mentioned in the resume.
Recruiter Alice Johnson has been assigned to this candidate to coordinate the interview process and screen the technical qualifications further.
Completed initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their software development skills, projects, and motivation for applying.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming their availability for the technical interview next week.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on May 8th at 10 AM with our senior engineer panel to assess coding and system design skills.
